description.en-US: The F-Droid repository for Breezy Weather

summary.cs: Počasí nabité funkcemi s pěknou vizualizací a mnoha zdroji dat.

summary.fr: Une appli météo riche en fonctionnalités, visualisations et sources supportées.

summary.pt: Uma app de clima rico em recursos com boas visualizações e muitas fontes.
summary.pt_BR: Um app de clima rico em recursos com boas visualizações e muitas fontes.

summary.th: A feature-rich weather app with good visualizations and many sources.
summary.uk: Багатофункціональні погодні додаток з гарною візуалізація та багатьма джерелами.
summary.zh_Hans: 一款功能丰富的天气应用，具备良好的数据可视化效果和多样的数据来源。
summary.zh_Hant: 功能強大、風格鮮明的全球天氣 app，支援多國官方及第三方天氣資料來源。
summary.zh_Hant_HK: 功能強大、風格鮮明的全球天氣 app，支援多國官方及第三方天氣資料來源。

description.cs: Breezy Weather je bezplatná open-source aplikace pro předpověď počasí s bohatou nabídkou funkcí a designem Material 3 Expressive. Nabízí propracované vizualizace a podporuje předpověď, aktuální počasí v reálném čase, nowcasting, kvalitu ovzduší, pylové zpravodajství a výstrahy z více než 50 zdrojů, jako jsou Open-Meteo. Funkce - Denní a hodinové předpovědi až na 16 dní - Srážky během další hodiny - Aktuální počasí - Informace o kvalitě ovzduší, alergenech a efemeridách - Výstrahy před nepříznivým počasím a srážkami - Volitelné sdílení dat s dalšími aplikacemi (jako je Gadgetbridge) - Zaměření na přístupnost pro čtečky obrazovky a další jazykové verze Vzhled - Material 3 Expressive - Podrobné 24hodinové grafy - Automatický tmavý režim - Vlastní balíčky ikon - Velký výběr widgetů - Živá tapeta Zdroje - Ve všech variantách: Open-Meteo, ANAM-BF, Bright Sky (DWD), DCCMS, DMN, DWR, EMI, FOSS Public Alert Server, GMet, IGEBU, INM, Mali-Météo, Météo Benin, Météo Tchad, Météo Togo, Mettelsat, MSD, Pirate Weather, Recosanté, SMA (Seychelles), SMA (Sudan), SSMS - Nesvobodné (nezahrnuté ve verzích s příponou _freenet): AccuWeather, AEMET, Atmo Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes, Atmo France, ATMO GrandEst, Atmo Hauts-de-France, AtmoSud, Baidu IP location, BMD, BMKG, CWA, DMI, ECCC, EKUK, EPD (Hong Kong), GeoNames, GeoSphere AT, HERE, HKO, Ilmateenistus, IMD, IMS, IP.SB, IPMA, LHMT, LVĢMC, JMA, MET Éireann, MET Norway, Met Office UK, Meteo AM, Météo-France, MeteoLux, MGM, Mixed China sources, NAMEM, NCDR, NCEI, NLSC, NWS, OpenWeather, PAGASA, SMG, Veðurstofa Íslands, WMO Severe Weather Oprávnění Vyžadované: - Síť (ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE, ACCESS_WIFI_STATE, INTERNET): načtení dat o počasí ze zdrojů na internetu Volitelné: - Služby na pozadí (RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETED, WAKE_LOCK, SET_ALARM, FOREGROUND_SERVICE, FOREGROUND_SERVICE_DATA_SYNC, FOREGROUND_SERVICE_SPECIAL_USE): aktualizace počasí na pozadí a naplánovaná oznámení o předpovědi - Ignorování optimalizací baterie (REQUEST_IGNORE_BATTERY_OPTIMIZATIONS): pomáhá zabránit ukončování aplikace na některých zařízeních - Posílání oznámení (POST_NOTIFICATIONS): výstrahy, srážky, dnešní/zítřejší předpověď, widget oznámení, postup aktualizací na pozadí atd. - Poloha (ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION, ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION, ACCESS_BACKGROUND_LOCATION): pro zobrazení počasí ve vaší aktuální poloze - Úložiště (READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE, WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE): pomáhá nastavit živou tapetu a/nebo widgety na některých zařízeních - Dlaždice (EXPAND_STATUS_BAR): umožňuje spuštění aplikace z Rychlých nastavení - Specifický jazyk aplikace (READ_APP_SPECIFIC_LOCALES): umožňuje uložit specifický jazyk aplikace a přečíst hodnotu po restartu na některých zařízeních Licence - GNU Lesser General Public License v3.0 - This License does not grant any rights in the trademarks, service marks, or logos of any Contributor. - Misrepresentation of the origin of that material is prohibited, and modified versions of such material must be marked in reasonable ways as different from the original version.
description.de-DE: Breezy Weather ist eine kostenlose und quelloffene Material 3 Expressive Wetter-App mit vielen Funktionen und durchdachten Visualisierungen, die Vorhersagen, Wetterbedingungen in Echtzeit, Kurzvorhersagen, Luftqualität, Pollen und Warnungen von über 50 Wetterquellen, wie Bright Sky (DWD), GeoSphere Austria, MeteoLux und Open-Meteo, bietet. Funktionen - Tägliche und stündliche Vorhersage für bis zu 16 Tage - Niederschlag in der nächsten Stunde - Wetterbedingungen in Echtzeit - Luftqualität, Pollen, Sonnen- und Mondzeiten - Extremwetter- und Starkregenwarnungen - Optionale Datenfreigabe für andere Apps (wie z.B. Gadgetbridge) - Fokus auf Barrierefreiheit für Screenreader und andere Sprachen Design - Material 3 Expressive - Detaillierte 24-Stunden-Diagramme - Automatischer dunkler Modus - Benutzerdefinierte Symbolpakete - Große Auswahl an Widgets - Live-Hintergrundbild Quellen - In jeder Version: Open-Meteo, ANAM-BF, Bright Sky (DWD), DCCMS, DMN, DWR, EMI, FOSS Public Alert Server, GMet, IGEBU, INM, Mali-Météo, Météo Benin, Météo Tchad, Météo Togo, Mettelsat, MSD, Pirate Weather, Recosanté, SMA (Seychelles), SMA (Sudan), SSMS - Nicht frei/selbst betreibbar (nicht in Versionen mit Suffix _freenet enthalten): AccuWeather, AEMET, Atmo Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes, Atmo France, ATMO GrandEst, Atmo Hauts-de-France, AtmoSud, Baidu IP location, BMD, BMKG, CWA, DMI, ECCC, EKUK, EPD (Hong Kong), GeoNames, GeoSphere AT, HERE, HKO, Ilmateenistus, IMD, IMS, IP.SB, IPMA, LHMT, LVĢMC, JMA, MET Éireann, MET Norway, Met Office UK, Meteo AM, Météo-France, MeteoLux, MGM, Mixed China sources, NAMEM, NCDR, NCEI, NLSC, NWS, OpenWeather, PAGASA, SMG, Veðurstofa Íslands, WMO Severe Weather Berechtigungen Notwendig: - Netzwerk (ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE, ACCESS_WIFI_STATE, INTERNET): Wetterdaten von Quellen über das Internet abrufen Optional: - Hintergrunddienste (RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETED, WAKE_LOCK, SET_ALARM, FOREGROUND_SERVICE, FOREGROUND_SERVICE_DATA_SYNC, FOREGROUND_SERVICE_SPECIAL_USE): Wetteraktualisierungen im Hintergrund und geplante Vorhersagebenachrichtigungen - Akkuoptimierungen ignorieren (REQUEST_IGNORE_BATTERY_OPTIMIZATIONS): Verhindert, dass die App auf manchen Geräten beendet wird - Benachrichtigungen senden (POST_NOTIFICATIONS): Warnungen, Niederschlag, Vorhersage für heute/morgen, Benachrichtigungs-Widget, Fortschritt von Hintergrundaktualisierungen, etc. - Standort (ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION, ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION, ACCESS_BACKGROUND_LOCATION): Um das Wetter für deinen aktuellen Standort anzuzeigen - Speicher (READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE, WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE): Hilft beim Anwenden des Live-Hintergundbildes und/oder Widgets auf manchen Geräten - Kachel (EXPAND_STATUS_BAR): Erlaubt das Starten der App über die Schnelleinstellungen - Bestimmte App-Sprache (READ_APP_SPECIFIC_LOCALES): Ermöglicht es auf manchen Geräten, eine bestimmte Sprache für die App zu speichern und diesen Wert nach einem Neustart auszulesen Lizenz - GNU Lesser General Public License v3.0 - This License does not grant any rights in the trademarks, service marks, or logos of any Contributor. - Misrepresentation of the origin of that material is prohibited, and modified versions of such material must be marked in reasonable ways as different from the original version.
description.en-US: Breezy Weather is a feature-rich free and open source Material 3 Expressive weather app with well-though-out visualizations, supporting forecast, real-time weather conditions, nowcasting, air quality, pollen, alerts, from more than 50 weather sources, such as NWS, Met Office UK, Met Éireann, ECCC and Open-Meteo. Features - Daily and hourly forecasts up to 16 days - Precipitation in the next hour - Real-time weather conditions - Air quality, allergen and ephemeris information - Severe weather and precipitation alerts - Opt-in data sharing with other apps (such as Gadgetbridge) - Focus on accessibility for screen readers and other locales Design - Material 3 Expressive - Detailed 24-hour charts - Automatic dark mode - Custom icon packs - Large selection of widgets - Live wallpaper Sources - In all flavors: Open-Meteo, ANAM-BF, Bright Sky (DWD), DCCMS, DMN, DWR, EMI, FOSS Public Alert Server, GMet, IGEBU, INM, Mali-Météo, Météo Benin, Météo Tchad, Météo Togo, Mettelsat, MSD, Pirate Weather, Recosanté, SMA (Seychelles), SMA (Sudan), SSMS - Not libre/self-hostable (not included in versions with suffix _freenet): AccuWeather, AEMET, Atmo Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes, Atmo France, ATMO GrandEst, Atmo Hauts-de-France, AtmoSud, Baidu IP location, BMD, BMKG, CWA, DMI, ECCC, EKUK, EPD (Hong Kong), GeoNames, GeoSphere AT, HERE, HKO, Ilmateenistus, IMD, IMS, IP.SB, IPMA, LHMT, LVĢMC, JMA, MET Éireann, MET Norway, Met Office UK, Meteo AM, Météo-France, MeteoLux, MGM, Mixed China sources, NAMEM, NCDR, NCEI, NLSC, NWS, OpenWeather, PAGASA, SMG, Veðurstofa Íslands, WMO Severe Weather Permissions Required: - Network (ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE, ACCESS_WIFI_STATE, INTERNET): fetch weather data from sources over the Internet Optional: - Background services (RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETED, WAKE_LOCK, SET_ALARM, FOREGROUND_SERVICE, FOREGROUND_SERVICE_DATA_SYNC, FOREGROUND_SERVICE_SPECIAL_USE): weather updates in the background and scheduled forecast notifications - Ignore battery optimizations (REQUEST_IGNORE_BATTERY_OPTIMIZATIONS): help preventing the app from being killed on some devices - Send notifications (POST_NOTIFICATIONS): alerts, precipitation, today/tomorrow forecast, notification-widget, update progress of background updates, etc - Location (ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION, ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION, ACCESS_BACKGROUND_LOCATION): to show weather in your current location - Storage (READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE, WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE): helps setting the live weather wallpaper and/or widgets on some devices - Tile (EXPAND_STATUS_BAR): allow to launch the app from Quick Settings - Specific app language (READ_APP_SPECIFIC_LOCALES): allows to save a specific language for the app and read the value after reboot on some devices License - GNU Lesser General Public License v3.0 - This License does not grant any rights in the trademarks, service marks, or logos of any Contributor. - Misrepresentation of the origin of that material is prohibited, and modified versions of such material must be marked in reasonable ways as different from the original version.
description.eo: Breezy Weather estas funkcioriĉa, libera kaj malferma fonto Material 3 Expressive veteraplikaĵo kun bonaj pripensemaj bildigoj, apoganta prognozo, realtempaj veterkondiĉojn, nuncastadon, aerkvaliton, polenon, alarmojn, de pli ol 50 veterfontoj, kiel ekzemple Open-Meteo. Funkcioj - Ĉiutagaj kaj horaj prognozoj ĝis 16 tagoj - Precipitaĵo en la sekva horo - Realtempaj veterkondiĉoj - Aerkvalito, alergio kaj ephemerida informoj - Severa vetero kaj precipitaĵo alarmoj - Opt-in datenoj dividantaj kun aliaj programoj (kiel ekzemple Gadgetbridge) - Fokuso sur alirebleco por ekranlegantoj kaj aliaj lingvoj Desegnaĵo - Material 3 Expressive - Detala 24-hora skemoj - Aŭtomata malhela reĝimo - Propraj ikono pakoj - Granda elektado de fenestraĵoj - Vivanta tapeto Sources - En ĉiuj versioj: Open-Meteo, ANAM-BF, Bright Sky (DWD), DCCMS, DMN, DWR, EMI, FOSS Public Alert Server, GMet, IGEBU, INM, Mali-Météo, Météo Benin, Météo Tchad, Météo Togo, Mettelsat, MSD, Pirate Weather, Recosanté, SMA (Seychelles), SMA (Sudan), SSMS - Not libre/self-hostable (not included in versions with suffix _freenet): AccuWeather, AEMET, Atmo Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes, Atmo France, ATMO GrandEst, Atmo Hauts-de-France, AtmoSud, Baidu IP location, BMD, BMKG, CWA, DMI, ECCC, EKUK, EPD (Hong Kong), GeoNames, GeoSphere AT, HERE, HKO, Ilmateenistus, IMD, IMS, IP.SB, IPMA, LHMT, LVĢMC, JMA, MET Éireann, MET Norway, Met Office UK, Meteo AM, Météo-France, MeteoLux, MGM, Mixed China sources, NAMEM, NCDR, NCEI, NLSC, NWS, OpenWeather, PAGASA, SMG, Veðurstofa Íslands, WMO Severe Weather Permissions Required: - Network (ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE, ACCESS_WIFI_STATE, INTERNET): fetch weather data from sources over the Internet Optional: - Background services (RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETED, WAKE_LOCK, SET_ALARM, FOREGROUND_SERVICE, FOREGROUND_SERVICE_DATA_SYNC, FOREGROUND_SERVICE_SPECIAL_USE): weather updates in the background and scheduled forecast notifications - Ignore battery optimizations (REQUEST_IGNORE_BATTERY_OPTIMIZATIONS): help preventing the app from being killed on some devices - Send notifications (POST_NOTIFICATIONS): alerts, precipitation, today/tomorrow forecast, notification-widget, update progress of background updates, etc - Location (ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION, ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION, ACCESS_BACKGROUND_LOCATION): to show weather in your current location - Storage (READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE, WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE): helps setting the live weather wallpaper and/or widgets on some devices - Tile (EXPAND_STATUS_BAR): allow to launch the app from Quick Settings - Specific app language (READ_APP_SPECIFIC_LOCALES): allows to save a specific language for the app and read the value after reboot on some devices License - GNU Lesser General Public License v3.0 - This License does not grant any rights in the trademarks, service marks, or logos of any Contributor. - Misrepresentation of the origin of that material is prohibited, and modified versions of such material must be marked in reasonable ways as different from the original version.
description.es-ES: Breezy Weather es una aplicación meteorológica gratuita y de código abierto, con muchas funciones basada en Materia 3 Expressive, con visualizaciones bien pensadas, que admite pronósticos, condiciones meteorológicas en tiempo real, nowcasting, calidad del aire, polen, alertas, de más de 50 fuentes meteorológicas, como AEMET, Météo-France, Servizio Meteo AM, DMI, Met Office, MET Norway, AccuWeather, OpenWeather y Open‑Meteo. Características - Pronósticos diarios y horarios de hasta 16 días - Precipitación en la próxima hora - Condiciones meteorológicas en tiempo real - Información de calidad del aire, alérgenos y efemérides - Alertas de clima severo y precipitación - Compartir datos de forma opcional con otras apps (como Gadgetbridge) - Enfoque a la accesibilidad para lectores de pantalla y otros idiomas Diseño - Materia 3 Expressive - Gráficos detallados 24 horas - Modo oscuro automático - Paquetes de iconos personalizados - Gran selección de widgets - Fondo de pantalla animado Fuentes - En todas las variantes: Open‑Meteo, ANAM‑BF, Bright Sky (DWD), DCCMS, DMN, DWR, EMI, FOSS Public Alert Server, GMet, IGEBU, INM, Mali‑Météo, Météo Benin, Météo Tchad, Météo Togo, Mettelsat, MSD, Pirate Weather, Recosanté, SMA (Seychelles), SMA (Sudán), SSMS - No libre/autohospedable (no incluidas en versiones con sufijo _freenet): AccuWeather, AEMET, Atmo Auvergne‑Rhône‑Alpes, Atmo France, ATMO GrandEst, Atmo Hauts‑de‑France, AtmoSud, Baidu IP location, BMD, BMKG, CWA, DMI, ECCC, EKUK, EPD (Hong Kong), GeoNames, GeoSphere AT, HERE, HKO, Ilmateenistus, IMD, IMS, IP.SB, IPMA, LHMT, LVĢMC, JMA, MET Éireann, MET Norway, Met Office UK, Meteo AM, Météo‑France, MeteoLux, MGM, Fuentes mixtas de China, NAMEM, NCDR, NCEI, NLSC, NWS, OpenWeather, PAGASA, SMG, Veðurstofa Íslands, WMO Severe Weather Permisos Obligatorios: - Red (ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE, ACCESS_WIFI_STATE, INTERNET): obtener datos meteorológicos de las fuentes a través de Internet Opcionales: - Servicios en segundo plano (RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETED, WAKE_LOCK, SET_ALARM, FOREGROUND_SERVICE, FOREGROUND_SERVICE_DATA_SYNC, FOREGROUND_SERVICE_SPECIAL_USE): actualizaciones meteorológicas en segundo plano y notificaciones programadas de pronósticos - Ignorar optimizaciones de batería (REQUEST_IGNORE_BATTERY_OPTIMIZATIONS): ayuda a evitar que la app sea cerrada en algunos dispositivos - Enviar notificaciones (POST_NOTIFICATIONS): alertas, precipitación, pronóstico de hoy/mañana, widget‑notificación, progreso de actualizaciones en segundo plano, etc. - Ubicación (ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION, ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION, ACCESS_BACKGROUND_LOCATION): mostrar el clima en tu ubicación actual - Almacenamiento (READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE, WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE): permite configurar el fondo de pantalla animado y/o widgets en algunos dispositivos - Azulejo (EXPAND_STATUS_BAR): permite lanzar la app desde Configuración rápida - Idioma específico de la app (READ_APP_SPECIFIC_LOCALES): permite guardar un idioma específico para la app y leerlo después del reinicio en algunos dispositivos Licencia - GNU Lesser General Public License v3.0 - This License does not grant any rights in the trademarks, service marks, or logos of any Contributor. - Misrepresentation of the origin of that material is prohibited, and modified versions of such material must be marked in reasonable ways as different from the original version.
description.fr: Breezy Weather est une application météo gratuite et libre en Material 3 Expressive avec des visualisations bien pensées, prenant en charge les prévisions, les conditions météorologiques en temps réel, les prévisions immédiates, la qualité de l'air, le pollen, les alertes, à partir de plus de 50 sources météorologiques, telles que Météo-France, Atmo, ECCC, MeteoLux et Open-Meteo. Fonctionnalités - Prévisions quotidiennes et horaires jusqu’à un maximum de 16 jours - Précipitations dans l’heure à venir - Conditions météorologiques en temps réel - Informations sur la qualité de l’air, les allergènes et l’éphéméride - Vigilances météo et alertes de précipitations - Partage sur demande des données avec d’autres applications (comme Gadgetbridge) - Accessibilité pour les lecteurs d’écran et pour d’autres localisations Design - Material 3 Expressive - Graphiques sur 24 heures détaillés - Thème sombre automatique - Packs d’icônes personnalisées - Large sélection de widgets - Fond d’écrans animés Sources - Toutes versions : Open-Meteo, ANAM-BF, Bright Sky (DWD), DCCMS, DMN, DWR, EMI, FOSS Public Alert Server, GMet, IGEBU, INM, Mali-Météo, Météo Benin, Météo Tchad, Météo Togo, Mettelsat, MSD, Pirate Weather, Recosanté, SMA (Seychelles), SMA (Sudan), SSMS - Sites non libres/auto-hébergeables (non inclues dans les versions avec suffixe _freenet) : AccuWeather, AEMET, Atmo Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes, Atmo France, ATMO GrandEst, Atmo Hauts-de-France, AtmoSud, Baidu IP location, BMD, BMKG, CWA, DMI, ECCC, EKUK, EPD (Hong Kong), GeoNames, GeoSphere AT, HERE, HKO, Ilmateenistus, IMD, IMS, IP.SB, IPMA, LHMT, LVĢMC, JMA, MET Éireann, MET Norway, Met Office UK, Meteo AM, Météo-France, MeteoLux, MGM, Mix de sources pour la Chine, NAMEM, NCDR, NCEI, NLSC, NWS, OpenWeather, PAGASA, SMG, Veðurstofa Íslands, OMM Centre d’Information des Phénomènes Dangereux Permissions Obligatoires : - Réseau (ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE, ACCESS_WIFI_STATE, INTERNET) : récupérer des données météo depuis des sources sur Internet Facultatives : - Services en arrière-plan (RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETED, WAKE_LOCK, SET_ALARM, FOREGROUND_SERVICE, FOREGROUND_SERVICE_DATA_SYNC, FOREGROUND_SERVICE_SPECIAL_USE) : mises à jour météo en arrière-plan et notifications programmées des prévisions - Ignorer l’optimisation de la batterie (REQUEST_IGNORE_BATTERY_OPTIMIZATIONS) : aide à empêcher l’application d’être tuée en arrière-plan sur certains appareils - Envoyer des notification (POST_NOTIFICATIONS) : vigilances, précipitations, prévisions du jour/lendemain, notification-widget, avancement des mises à jour en arrière-plan, etc - Localisation (ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION, ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION, ACCESS_BACKGROUND_LOCATION) : pour afficher la météo pour votre position actuelle - Stockage (READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE, WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE) : permet à l’application de définir le fond d’écran animé et/ou les widgets sur certains appareils - Icône système (EXPAND_STATUS_BAR) : permet de lancer l’application depuis les paramètres rapides - Langue spécifique pour l’appli (READ_APP_SPECIFIC_LOCALES): permet de sauvegarder une langue spécifique pour l’appli et lire sa valeur après un redémarrage pour certains appareils Licence - GNU Lesser General Public License v3.0 - This License does not grant any rights in the trademarks, service marks, or logos of any Contributor. - Misrepresentation of the origin of that material is prohibited, and modified versions of such material must be marked in reasonable ways as different from the original version.
description.hu: A Breezy Weather egy funkciógazdag, ingyenes és nyílt forráskódú, Material 3 Expressive kinézettel rendelkező időjárás-alkalmazás, átlátható felülettel. Támogatja az előrejelzéseket, a valós idejű időjárási viszonyokat, a közvetlen előrejelzést (nowcasting), a levegőminőségi és pollenadatokat, valamint a riasztásokat több mint 50 időjárási forrásból, mint például az Open-Meteo. Funkciók - Napi és óránkénti előrejelzések akár 16 napra - Csapadék a következő órában - Valós idejű időjárási viszonyok - Nap/Hold állási-, levegőminőségi- és allergén információk - Veszélyes időjárás- és csapadékriasztások - Adatmegosztás más alkalmazásokkal (például Gadgetbridge) - Fókuszban a kisegítőlehetőségek, a képernyőolvasók és más területi beállítások számára Kinézet - Material 3 Expressive - Részletes, 24 órás diagramok - Automatikus sötét mód - Egyéni ikoncsomagok - Modulok széles választéka - Élő háttérkép Források - Minden verzióban: Open-Meteo, ANAM-BF, Bright Sky (DWD), DCCMS, DMN, DWR, EMI, FOSS Public Alert Server, GMet, IGEBU, INM, Mali-Météo, Météo Benin, Météo Tchad, Météo Togo, Mettelsat, MSD, Pirate Weather, Recosanté, SMA (Seychelles), SMA (Sudan), SSMS - Nem szabad/saját tárhelyen futtatható (a _freenet utótagú verziók nem tartalmazzák): AccuWeather, AEMET, Atmo Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes, Atmo France, ATMO GrandEst, Atmo Hauts-de-France, AtmoSud, Baidu IP location, BMD, BMKG, CWA, DMI, ECCC, EKUK, EPD (Hong Kong), GeoNames, GeoSphere AT, HERE, HKO, Ilmateenistus, IMD, IMS, IP.SB, IPMA, LHMT, LVĢMC, JMA, MET Éireann, MET Norway, Met Office UK, Meteo AM, Météo-France, MeteoLux, MGM, Mixed China sources, NAMEM, NCDR, NCEI, NLSC, NWS, OpenWeather, PAGASA, SMG, Veðurstofa Íslands, WMO Severe Weather Engedélyek Szükséges: - Hálózat (ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE, ACCESS_WIFI_STATE, INTERNET): időjárási adatok letöltése a forrásokból az interneten keresztül Nem kötelező: - Háttérszolgáltatások (RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETED, WAKE_LOCK, SET_ALARM, FOREGROUND_SERVICE, FOREGROUND_SERVICE_DATA_SYNC, FOREGROUND_SERVICE_SPECIAL_USE): időjárás-frissítések a háttérben és ütemezett előrejelzési értesítések - Akkumulátorkímélő mód figyelmen kívül hagyása (REQUEST_IGNORE_BATTERY_OPTIMIZATIONS): segít megelőzni, hogy az alkalmazás leálljon egyes eszközökön - Értesítések küldése (POST_NOTIFICATIONS): riasztások, csapadék, mai/holnapi előrejelzés, értesítési modul, háttérfrissítések folyamatának jelzése stb. - Helyadatok (ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION, ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION, ACCESS_BACKGROUND_LOCATION): a jelenlegi tartózkodási helyén lévő időjárás megjelenítéséhez - Tárhely (READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE, WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE): segít az élő időjárás-háttérkép és/vagy modulok beállításában egyes eszközökön - Csempe (EXPAND_STATUS_BAR): lehetővé teszi az alkalmazás elindítását a gyorsbeállításokból - Alkalmazás-specifikus nyelv (READ_APP_SPECIFIC_LOCALES): lehetővé teszi egy adott nyelv mentését az alkalmazáshoz, és az érték beolvasását újraindítás után egyes eszközökön Licenc - GNU Lesser General Public License v3.0 - This License does not grant any rights in the trademarks, service marks, or logos of any Contributor. - Misrepresentation of the origin of that material is prohibited, and modified versions of such material must be marked in reasonable ways as different from the original version.
description.it: Breezy Weather è un'applicazione meteo ricca di funzioni e open source con interfaccia Material 3 Expressive; offre visualizzazioni ben pensate, previsioni, condizioni in tempo reale, qualità dell'aria, pollini, allerte meteo ottenute da più di 50 fonti, come Meteo AM e Open-Meteo. Funzionalità - Previsioni orarie e giornaliere fino a 16 giorni - Condizioni in tempo reale - Precipitazioni durante l'ora a venire - Qualità dell'aria, allergeni e dati sole e luna - Avvisi di maltempo e di precipitazioni - Condivisione opzionale dei dati con altre app (come Gadgetbridge) - Attenzione sull'accessibilità per lettori di schermi e altre lingue Design - Material 3 Expressive - Grafici 24h dettagliati - Tema scuro automatico - Temi di icone personalizzati - Ampia scelta di widget - Sfondo animato Sorgenti - Generali: Open-Meteo, ANAM-BF, Bright Sky (DWD), DCCMS, DMN, DWR, EMI, FOSS Public Alert Server, GMet, IGEBU, INM, Mali-Météo, Météo Benin, Météo Tchad, Météo Togo, Mettelsat, MSD, Pirate Weather, Recosanté, SMA (Seychelles), SMA (Sudan), SSMS - Non libere/self-hostable (non incluse nella versione suffix _freenet): AccuWeather, AEMET, Atmo Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes, Atmo France, ATMO GrandEst, Atmo Hauts-de-France, AtmoSud, Baidu IP location, BMD, BMKG, CWA, DMI, ECCC, EKUK, EPD (Hong Kong), GeoNames, GeoSphere AT, HERE, HKO, Ilmateenistus, IMD, IMS, IP.SB, IPMA, LHMT, LVĢMC, JMA, MET Éireann, MET Norway, Met Office UK, Meteo AM, Météo-France, MeteoLux, MGM, Varie fonti per la Cina, NAMEM, NCDR, NCEI, NLSC, NWS, OpenWeather, PAGASA, SMG, Veðurstofa Íslands, OMM Eventi Meteorologici Estremi Autorizzazioni Obbligatorie: - Rete (ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE, ACCESS_WIFI_STATE, INTERNET): recupera dati usando la rete internet Facoltative: - Servizi in secondo piano (RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETED, WAKE_LOCK, SET_ALARM, FOREGROUND_SERVICE, FOREGROUND_SERVICE_DATA_SYNC, FOREGROUND_SERVICE_SPECIAL_USE): le previsioni si aggiornano in secondo piano e notifiche per le previsioni - Ignora ottimizzazione batteria (REQUEST_IGNORE_BATTERY_OPTIMIZATIONS): aiuta a prevenire che l'app venga chiusa su alcuni dispositivi - Invia notifiche (POST_NOTIFICATIONS): avvisi, precipitazioni, previsioni, widget, progresso aggiornamento, etc - Posizione (ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION, ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION, ACCESS_BACKGROUND_LOCATION): accesso alla posizione corrente per le previsioni - Memoria (READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE, WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE): aiuta a impostare il live wallpaper e i widget su alcuni dispositivi - Tile (EXPAND_STATUS_BAR): permette di lanciare l'app da Quick Settings - Lingua specifica dell'app (READ_APP_SPECIFIC_LOCALES): permette di salvare una specifica lingua per l'app e di leggerla dopo il riavvio di alcuni dispositivi Licenze - GNU Lesser General Public License v3.0 - This License does not grant any rights in the trademarks, service marks, or logos of any Contributor. - Misrepresentation of the origin of that material is prohibited, and modified versions of such material must be marked in reasonable ways as different from the original version.
description.pl-PL: Breezy Weather to rozbudowana, darmowa aplikacja pogodowa oparta na Material 3 Expressive i otwartym kodzie źródłowym, z przemyślanymi wizualizacjami - Obsługuje prognozy, bieżące warunki pogodowe, nowcasting, jakość powietrza, pyłki, alerty – z ponad 50 źródeł, takich jak Bright Sky (DWD), ECCC i Open-Meteo. Funkcje - Prognozy dzienne i godzinowe do 16 dni - Opady w ciągu najbliższej godziny - Bieżące warunki pogodowe - Informacje o jakości powietrza, alergenach i efemerydach - Ostrzeżenia o niebezpiecznych zjawiskach i opadach - Opcjonalne udostępnianie danych innym aplikacjom (np. Gadgetbridge) - Skoncentrowanie na dostępności dla czytników ekranu i różnych języków Wygląd - Material 3 Expressive - Szczegółowe wykresy 24-godzinny - Automatyczny tryb ciemny - Własne pakiety ikon - Duży wybór widżetów - Tapeta pogodowa na żywo Źródła - Dostępne we wszystkich wersjach: Open-Meteo, ANAM-BF, Bright Sky (DWD), DCCMS, DMN, DWR, EMI, FOSS Public Alert Server, GMet, IGEBU, INM, Mali-Météo, Météo Benin, Météo Tchad, Météo Togo, Mettelsat, MSD, Pirate Weather, Recosanté, SMA (Seychelles), SMA (Sudan), SSMS - Niewolne/niesamohostowalne (niedostępne w wersjach z końcówką _freenet): AccuWeather, AEMET, Atmo Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes, Atmo France, ATMO GrandEst, Atmo Hauts-de-France, AtmoSud, Baidu IP location, BMD, BMKG, CWA, DMI, ECCC, EKUK, EPD (Hongkong), GeoNames, GeoSphere AT, HERE, HKO, Ilmateenistus, IMD, IMS, IP.SB, IPMA, LHMT, LVĢMC, JMA, MET Éireann, MET Norway, Met Office UK, Meteo AM, Météo-France, MeteoLux, MGM, Mixed China sources, NAMEM, NCDR, NCEI, NLSC, NWS, OpenWeather, PAGASA, SMG, Veðurstofa Íslands, WMO Severe Weather Uprawnienia Wymagane: - Sieć (ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE, ACCESS_WIFI_STATE, INTERNET) – pobieranie danych pogodowych z Internetu Opcjonalne: - Usługi w tle (RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETED, WAKE_LOCK, SET_ALARM, FOREGROUND_SERVICE, FOREGROUND_SERVICE_DATA_SYNC, FOREGROUND_SERVICE_SPECIAL_USE) – aktualizacje pogody w tle i zaplanowane powiadomienia o prognozie - Ignorowanie optymalizacji baterii (REQUEST_IGNORE_BATTERY_OPTIMIZATIONS) – zapobiega ubijaniu aplikacji na niektórych urządzeniach - Wysyłanie powiadomień (POST_NOTIFICATIONS) – alerty, opady, prognoza na dziś/jutro, widżet powiadomień, postęp aktualizacji w tle itd. - Lokalizacja (ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION, ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION, ACCESS_BACKGROUND_LOCATION) – aby wyświetlać pogodę w bieżącej lokalizacji - Pamięć (READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE, WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE) – umożliwia ustawienie tapety pogodowej na żywo i/lub widżetów na niektórych urządzeniach - Kafelki (EXPAND_STATUS_BAR) – umożliwia uruchamianie aplikacji z paska Szybkich ustawień - Język aplikacji (READ_APP_SPECIFIC_LOCALES) – pozwala zapisać język aplikacji i odczytać go po ponownym uruchomieniu urządzenia Licencja - GNU Lesser General Public License v3.0 - This License does not grant any rights in the trademarks, service marks, or logos of any Contributor. - Misrepresentation of the origin of that material is prohibited, and modified versions of such material must be marked in reasonable ways as different from the original version.
description.pt_BR: O Breezy Weather é um app de clima livre e de código aberto, rico em recursos, em Material 3 Expressive, com visualizações bem pensadas. Há suporte para previsões, condições do clima em tempo real, previsões imediatas, qualidade do ar, polén, alertas, e mais de 50 fontes de meteorologia, como o Open-Meteo. Recursos - Previsões diárias e horárias até 16 dias - Precipitação na próxima hora - Condições do clima em tempo real - Informações da qualidade do ar, polén, e horários de nascer e pôr do sol e da lua - Alertas severos do clima e precipitações - Compartilhamento opcional de dados com outros apps (como o Gadgetbridge) - Foco na acessibilidade para leitores de tela e outros idiomas Design - Em Material 3 Expressive - Gráficos em 24 horas detalhados - Modo escuro automático - Pacotes de ícones personalizados - Grande seleção de widgets - Plano de fundo ao vivo Fontes - Em todas as versões: Open-Meteo, ANAM-BF, Bright Sky (DWD), DCCMS, DMN, DWR, EMI, FOSS Public Alert Server, GMet, IGEBU, INM, Mali-Météo, Météo Benin, Météo Tchad, Météo Togo, Mettelsat, MSD, Pirate Weather, Recosanté, SMA (Seychelles), SMA (Sudan), SSMS - Não-livres/não-autohospedáveis (não estão incluídos em versão com sufixo _freenet): AccuWeather, AEMET, Atmo Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes, Atmo France, ATMO GrandEst, Atmo Hauts-de-France, AtmoSud, Baidu IP location, BMD, BMKG, CWA, DMI, ECCC, EKUK, EPD (Hong Kong), GeoNames, GeoSphere AT, HERE, HKO, Ilmateenistus, IMD, IMS, IP.SB, IPMA, LHMT, LVĢMC, JMA, MET Éireann, MET Norway, Met Office UK, Meteo AM, Météo-France, MeteoLux, MGM, Mixed China sources, NAMEM, NCDR, NCEI, NLSC, NWS, OpenWeather, PAGASA, SMG, Veðurstofa Íslands, OMM Tempo Severo Permissões Necessárias: - Rede (ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE, ACCESS_WIFI_STATE, INTERNET): para obter os dados do clima de fontes da internet Opcionais: - Serviços em segundo plano (RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETED, WAKE_LOCK, SET_ALARM, FOREGROUND_SERVICE, FOREGROUND_SERVICE_DATA_SYNC, FOREGROUND_SERVICE_SPECIAL_USE): para atualizações do clima em segundo plano e notificações de previsão em cronograma - Ignorar otimizações de bateria (REQUEST_IGNORE_BATTERY_OPTIMIZATIONS): para ajudar a prevenir que o app seja encerrado em alguns dispositivos - Enviar notificações (POST_NOTIFICATIONS): alertas, precipitações, previsão de hoje/amanhã, widget de notificação, progresso das atualizações em segundo plano, etc - Localização (ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION, ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION, ACCESS_BACKGROUND_LOCATION): para mostrar o clima na sua localização atual - Armazenamento (READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE, WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE): ajuda a configurar o plano de fundo de clima ao vivo e widgets em alguns dispositivos - Bloco (EXPAND_STATUS_BAR): permite abrir o app das Configurações Rápidas - Idioma do app específico (READ_APP_SPECIFIC_LOCALES): permite salvar um idioma específico para o app e ler o dado após reiniciar em alguns dispositivos Licença - GNU Lesser General Public License v3.0 - This License does not grant any rights in the trademarks, service marks, or logos of any Contributor. - Misrepresentation of the origin of that material is prohibited, and modified versions of such material must be marked in reasonable ways as different from the original version.
description.ru-RU: Breezy Weather (англ. Свежая погода) — это многофункциональное, свободное и бесплатное приложение в Материальном дизайне с продуманной визуализацией, поддерживающее прогноз погоды, погодные условия в на сейчас, ближний прогноз текущей погоды, качество воздуха, пыльцу, оповещения из более чем 50ти источников погоды, таких как Open-Meteo. Возможности - Дневной и почасовой прогноз до 16 дней - Осадки в ближайший час - Текущие погодные условия - Информация о качестве воздуха, аллергенах и эфемеридах небесных тел - Оповещения об опасных погодных условиях и осадках - Возможность делиться данными с другими приложениями (например, GadgetBridge) - Упор на доступность для программ чтения с экрана и других мест Дизайн - Material 3 Expressive - Подробные 24х-часовые графики - Автоматический тёмный режим - Наборы пользовательских значков - Большой выбор виджетов - Живые обои Источники погоды - Во всех видах: Open-Meteo, ANAM-BF, Bright Sky (DWD), DCCMS, DMN, DWR, EMI, FOSS Public Alert Server, GMet, IGEBU, INM, Mali-Météo, Météo Benin, Météo Tchad, Météo Togo, Mettelsat, MSD, Pirate Weather, Recosanté, SMA (Seychelles), SMA (Sudan), SSMS - Несвободные (не включены в версии с суфиксом _freenet): AccuWeather, AEMET, Atmo Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes, Atmo France, ATMO GrandEst, Atmo Hauts-de-France, AtmoSud, Baidu IP location, BMD, BMKG, CWA, DMI, ECCC, EKUK, EPD (Hong Kong), GeoNames, GeoSphere AT, HERE, HKO, Ilmateenistus, IMD, IMS, IP.SB, IPMA, LHMT, LVĢMC, JMA, MET Éireann, MET Norway, Met Office UK, Meteo AM, Météo-France, MeteoLux, MGM, смешанные китайские источники, NAMEM, NCDR, NCEI, NLSC, NWS, OpenWeather, PAGASA, SMG, Veðurstofa Íslands, ВМО неблагоприятных погодных условий Разрешения Требуемые: - Доступ в сеть (ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE, ACCESS_WIFI_STATE, INTERNET): чтобы получать данные о погоде из источников через Интернет Необязательные: - Фоновые сервисы (RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETED, WAKE_LOCK, SET_ALARM, FOREGROUND_SERVICE, FOREGROUND_SERVICE_DATA_SYNC, FOREGROUND_SERVICE_SPECIAL_USE): обновления погоды в фоновом режиме и запланированные уведомления о прогнозе погоды - Отключить оптимизацию батареи (REQUEST_IGNORE_BATTERY_OPTIMIZATIONS): помогает предотвратить закрытие приложения на некоторых устройствах - Отправлять оповещения (POST_NOTIFICATIONS): оповещения, осадки, прогноз на сегодня/завтра, виджет уведомлений, ход обновления фоновых обновлений и т. д. - Местоположение (ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION, ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION, ACCESS_BACKGROUND_LOCATION): чтобы показать погоду в вашем текущем местоположении - Storage (READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE, WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE): помогает установить живые обои и виджеты погоды на некоторых устройствах - Панель быстрого доступа (EXPAND_STATUS_BAR): разрешить запуск приложения из быстрых настроек - Выбор языка (READ_APP_SPECIFIC_LOCALES): позволяет сохранить определенный язык для приложения и прочитать значение после перезагрузки на некоторых устройствах Лицензия - GNU Lesser General Public License v3.0 - This License does not grant any rights in the trademarks, service marks, or logos of any Contributor. - Misrepresentation of the origin of that material is prohibited, and modified versions of such material must be marked in reasonable ways as different from the original version.
description.uk: Breezy Weather — це багатофункціональний безкоштовний метеододаток з відкритим вихідним кодом, розроблений на базі Material 3 Expressive, з добре продуманими візуалізаціями, підтримкою прогнозу, погодних умов у реальному часі, прогнозу поточної погоди, якості повітря, пилку, сповіщень з понад 50 джерел погоди, таких як Open-Meteo. Функції - Щоденні та погодинні прогнози до 16 днів - Опади на наступну годину - Погодні умови в режимі реального часу - Інформація про якість повітря, алергени та ефемериди - Сповіщення про несприятливі погодні умови та опади - Обмін даними з іншими програмами (наприклад, Gadgetbridge) за допомогою згоди - Акцент на доступності для програм зчитування з екрана та інших локалізацій Дизайн - Material 3 Expressive - Детальні 24-годинні графіки - Автоматичний темний режим - Користувацькі пакети значків - Великий вибір віджетів - Живі шпалери Джерела - У всіх варіантах: Open-Meteo, ANAM-BF, Bright Sky (DWD), DCCMS, DMN, DWR, EMI, FOSS Public Alert Server, GMet, IGEBU, INM, Mali-Météo, Météo Benin, Météo Tchad, Météo Togo, Mettelsat, MSD, Pirate Weather, Recosanté, SMA (Сейшельські острови), SMA (Судан), SSMS - Не безкоштовно/самостійно розміщений (не входить у версії з суфіксом _freenet): AccuWeather, AEMET, Atmo Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes, Atmo France, ATMO GrandEst, Atmo Hauts-de-France, AtmoSud, Baidu IP location, BMD, BMKG, CWA, DMI, ECCC, EKUK, EPD (Гонконг), GeoNames, GeoSphere AT, HERE, HKO, Ilmateenistus, IMD, IMS, IP.SB, IPMA, LHMT, LVĢMC, JMA, MET Éireann, MET Norway, Met Office UK, Meteo AM, Météo-France, MeteoLux, MGM, Mixed China sources, NAMEM, NCDR, NCEI, NLSC, NWS, OpenWeather, PAGASA, SMG, Veðurstofa Íslands, WMO Severe Погода Дозволи Обов'язково: - Мережа (ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE, ACCESS_WIFI_STATE, INTERNET): отримання даних про погоду з джерел через Інтернет Додатково: - Фонові служби (RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETED, WAKE_LOCK, SET_ALARM, FOREGROUND_SERVICE, FOREGROUND_SERVICE_DATA_SYNC, FOREGROUND_SERVICE_SPECIAL_USE): оновлення погоди у фоновому режимі та заплановані сповіщення про прогноз - Ігнорувати оптимізацію батареї (REQUEST_IGNORE_BATTERY_OPTIMIZATIONS): запобігання завершенню роботи програми на деяких пристроях - Надсилати сповіщення (POST_NOTIFICATIONS): сповіщення, опади, прогноз на сьогодні/завтра, віджет сповіщень, прогрес оновлення фонових оновлень тощо - Місцезнаходження (ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION, ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION, ACCESS_BACKGROUND_LOCATION): для відображення погоди у вашому поточному місці розташування - Сховище (READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE, WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE): допомагає налаштувати живі шпалери погоди та/або віджети на деяких пристроях - Плитка (EXPAND_STATUS_BAR): дозволяє запускати програму з Швидких налаштувань - Певна мова програми (READ_APP_SPECIFIC_LOCALES): дозволяє зберігати певну мову для програми та зчитувати значення після перезавантаження на деяких пристроях Ліцензія - GNU Lesser General Public License v3.0 - This License does not grant any rights in the trademarks, service marks, or logos of any Contributor. - Misrepresentation of the origin of that material is prohibited, and modified versions of such material must be marked in reasonable ways as different from the original version.
description.zh_Hans: Breezy Weather 是一款功能丰富、免费开源的天气应用，采用 Material 3 Expressive 设计风格，提供精心设计的可视化效果。支持来自 50 多个气象源的预报、实时天气、临近预报、空气质量、花粉浓度及警报功能，包括中国混合数据源、香港环保署 、香港天文台、台湾气象局、台湾灾害防救科技中心和 Open-Meteo 等机构。 核心功能 - 长达 16 天的逐日与逐小时预报 - 未来 1 小时降水预测 - 实时气象状况监测 - 空气质量、过敏原及天文信息 - 恶劣天气与降水警报 - 可选数据共享（如 Gadgetbridge） - 支持屏幕阅读器与多语言无障碍访问 设计特色 - Material 3 Expressive 动态主题 - 精细化 24 小时气象图表 - 自动深色模式 - 自定义图标包 - 丰富的小组件库 - 动态天气壁纸 数据来源 - 全版本通用源：Open-Meteo, ANAM-BF, Bright Sky (DWD), DCCMS, DMN, DWR, EMI, FOSS Public Alert Server, GMet, IGEBU, INM, Mali-Météo, Météo Benin, Météo Tchad, Météo Togo, Mettelsat, MSD, Pirate Weather, Recosanté, SMA (Seychelles), SMA (Sudan), SSMS - 非自由软件/无法自托管源（不含 _freenet 后缀版本）：AccuWeather, AEMET, Atmo Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes, Atmo France, ATMO GrandEst, Atmo Hauts-de-France, AtmoSud, Baidu IP location, BMD, BMKG, CWA, DMI, ECCC, EKUK, EPD (Hong Kong), GeoNames, GeoSphere AT, HERE, HKO, Ilmateenistus, IMD, IMS, IP.SB, IPMA, LHMT, LVĢMC, JMA, MET Éireann, MET Norway, Met Office UK, Meteo AM, Météo-France, MeteoLux, MGM, Mixed China sources, NAMEM, NCDR, NCEI, NLSC, NWS, OpenWeather, PAGASA, SMG, Veðurstofa Íslands, WMO Severe Weather 权限说明 必选权限： - 网络访问（ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE, ACCESS_WIFI_STATE, INTERNET）：通过互联网获取气象数据 可选权限： - 后台服务（RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETED, WAKE_LOCK, SET_ALARM, FOREGROUND_SERVICE, FOREGROUND_SERVICE_DATA_SYNC, FOREGROUND_SERVICE_SPECIAL_USE）：后台天气更新及定时预报通知 - 忽略电池优化（REQUEST_IGNORE_BATTERY_OPTIMIZATIONS）：防止应用在某些设备上被强制终止 - 通知推送（POST_NOTIFICATIONS）：警报、降水提醒、当日/次日预报、通知型小组件、后台更新进度等 - 位置访问（ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION, ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION, ACCESS_BACKGROUND_LOCATION）：获取当前位置天气 - 存储空间（READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE, WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE）：在某些设备设置动态天气壁纸/小组件 - 快捷磁贴（EXPAND_STATUS_BAR）：通过快捷设置面板启动应用 - 应用专属语言（READ_APP_SPECIFIC_LOCALES）：为应用保存特定语言设置，支持部分设备重启后读取配置 许可证 - GNU Lesser General Public License v3.0 - This License does not grant any rights in the trademarks, service marks, or logos of any Contributor. - Misrepresentation of the origin of that material is prohibited, and modified versions of such material must be marked in reasonable ways as different from the original version.
description.zh_Hant: Breezy Weather 是一款功能強大的免費開源天氣應用程式，使用 Material 3 Expressive 風格，視覺效果精心設計，提供天氣預報、即時天氣概況、降水即時預報、空氣品質、花粉、警特報等資訊，並支援超過 50 個天氣來源，包括中央氣象署、國家災害防救科技中心、香港天文台、地球物理氣象局、混合中國天氣來源以及 Open-Meteo 等。 功能 - 最多長達 16 天的逐日及逐時預報 - 未來一小時的降水預報 - 即時天氣概況 - 空氣品質、過敏原及日月出沒資訊 - 劇烈天氣和降水警特報 - 可選擇與其他應用程式（如 Gadgetbridge）分享資料 - 專注螢幕助讀程式及其他地區設定的無障礙體驗 設計 - Material 3 Expressive - 詳細的 24 小時圖表 - 自動深色模式 - 自訂圖示套件 - 大量小工具 - 動態桌布 來源 - 所有組件組態均包含以下資料來源：Open-Meteo, ANAM-BF, Bright Sky (DWD), DCCMS, DMN, DWR, EMI, FOSS Public Alert Server, GMet, IGEBU, INM, Mali-Météo, Météo Benin, Météo Tchad, Météo Togo, Mettelsat, MSD, Pirate Weather, Recosanté, SMA (Seychelles), SMA (Sudan), SSMS - 非自由軟體／不能自我裝載的資料來源（不包含在後綴為 _freenet 的版本）：AccuWeather, AEMET, Atmo Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes, Atmo France, ATMO GrandEst, Atmo Hauts-de-France, AtmoSud, Baidu IP location, BMD, BMKG, CWA, DMI, ECCC, EKUK, EPD (Hong Kong), GeoNames, GeoSphere AT, HERE, HKO, Ilmateenistus, IMD, IMS, IP.SB, IPMA, LHMT, LVĢMC, JMA, MET Éireann, MET Norway, Met Office UK, Meteo AM, Météo-France, MeteoLux, MGM, Mixed China sources, NAMEM, NCDR, NCEI, NLSC, NWS, OpenWeather, PAGASA, SMG, Veðurstofa Íslands, WMO Severe Weather 權限 必須授予： - 網路 (ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE, ACCESS_WIFI_STATE, INTERNET)：從網路來源擷取天氣資料 選擇性授予： - 背景服務 (RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETED, WAKE_LOCK, SET_ALARM, FOREGROUND_SERVICE, FOREGROUND_SERVICE_DATA_SYNC, FOREGROUND_SERVICE_SPECIAL_USE)：在背景更新天氣資料，及排程預報通知 - 忽略電池最佳化 (REQUEST_IGNORE_BATTERY_OPTIMIZATIONS)：在某些裝置上可防止應用程式被強制終止 - 傳送通知 (POST_NOTIFICATIONS)：警特報、降水、今日／明日預報、通知小工具、背景更新進度等 - 位置 (ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION, ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION, ACCESS_BACKGROUND_LOCATION)：顯示您目前位置的天氣 - 儲存空間 (READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE, WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE)：在某些裝置上設定天氣動態桌布及／或小工具 - 方塊 (EXPAND_STATUS_BAR)：在 Android 快速設定啟動應用程式 - 應用程式特定語言 (READ_APP_SPECIFIC_LOCALES)：在某些裝置上儲存應用程式語言設定，以便重新開機後讀取 授權 - GNU Lesser General Public License v3.0 - This License does not grant any rights in the trademarks, service marks, or logos of any Contributor. - Misrepresentation of the origin of that material is prohibited, and modified versions of such material must be marked in reasonable ways as different from the original version.
